title: Lifelong Learning and Educational Participation
description: As an IDD community member I want to continue learning and growing throughout my life So that I can develop new skills, pursue interests, and experience ongoing growth
content:
Feature: Lifelong Learning and Educational Participation
  As an IDD community member
  I want to continue learning and growing throughout my life
  So that I can develop new skills, pursue interests, and experience ongoing growth

  Background:
    Given Jordan is 26 years old and learning never stops
    And educational opportunities should be available throughout life
    And Jordan deserves accessible instruction that honors their capability
    And the educational_elohim coordinates learning with dignity and support

  Scenario: Learning new job skills with accessible instruction
    Given Jordan wants to learn library cataloging skills
    And the library offers training for this task
    When Jordan participates in the training
    Then instruction is provided in cognitively accessible format
    And the trainer uses simple language, visual aids, and step-by-step guidance
    And Jordan can practice skills with patient repetition
    And mistakes are treated as learning opportunities, not failures
    And Jordan's progress is celebrated at each milestone
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for skill development contribution
    And Jordan experiences growth and increasing capability

  Scenario: Pursuing personal interest through adult education
    Given Jordan loves art and wants to improve drawing skills
    And the community college offers accessible art classes
    When Jordan enrolls in the drawing class
    Then registration process uses accessible language and support
    And the instructor adapts teaching to Jordan's learning style
    And Jordan creates art alongside other adult students
    And Jordan's artistic expression is valued, not patronized
    And Jordan experiences being a lifelong learner
    And Jordan's creative contributions are celebrated authentically

  Scenario: Participating in financial literacy education
    Given Jordan is learning to manage money independently
    And the support organization offers financial skills classes
    When Jordan attends financial literacy sessions
    Then concepts are taught using concrete examples and visual aids
    And Jordan practices skills with real-world simulations
    And the personal_agent reinforces learning in daily situations
    And Jordan's financial understanding grows over time
    And Jordan gains confidence in money management
    And Jordan's increasing financial autonomy is supported through education

  Scenario: Learning health and wellness information accessibly
    Given Jordan wants to understand their own health better
    And health literacy supports self-advocacy
    When Jordan uses health education resources
    Then the personal_agent provides health information in simple language
    And medical concepts are explained with pictures and examples
    And Jordan can ask questions and explore topics at their pace
    And Jordan's health knowledge increases over time
    And Jordan becomes better able to participate in health decisions
    And Jordan's informed health participation is supported through accessible education

  Scenario: Developing social skills through structured learning
    Given Jordan wants to improve conversation skills
    And social skills education can support relationship building
    When Jordan participates in social skills group
    Then the group uses accessible teaching methods (role-play, video modeling)
    And Jordan practices skills with peer learners
    And successes are celebrated and challenges are normalized
    And Jordan's social confidence grows through practice
    And improved skills enhance Jordan's community participation
    And Jordan experiences personal growth and capability development

  Scenario: Learning technology skills for independence
    Given Jordan wants to use a smartphone more independently
    And technology skills increase autonomy
    When Jordan takes assistive technology training
    Then instruction is patient, repetitive, and accessible
    And the trainer adapts to Jordan's learning pace
    And Jordan practices each skill until it becomes comfortable
    And the personal_agent provides ongoing coaching
    And Jordan's technology capability increases over time
    And Jordan experiences growing independence through skill development

  Scenario: Participating in civic education and voting preparation
    Given Jordan is a citizen with the right to vote
    And informed voting requires accessible civic education
    When election season approaches and Jordan wants to vote
    Then the educational_elohim provides voter education in accessible format
    And candidates and issues are explained with simple language and visuals
    And Jordan learns about voting process step-by-step
    And Jordan can make informed voting choices with support
    And Jordan's civic participation is enabled through education
    And Jordan experiences full citizenship through accessible learning

  Scenario: Learning self-advocacy skills for empowerment
    Given Jordan wants to speak up for their needs and preferences
    And self-advocacy skills support autonomy and dignity
    When Jordan participates in self-advocacy training
    Then Jordan learns to identify and express their needs
    And the training uses accessible methods (visual aids, role-play, practice)
    And Jordan practices advocating in low-stakes situations
    And Jordan's advocacy voice grows stronger over time
    And support workers honor Jordan's self-advocacy
    And Jordan experiences empowerment through skill development

  Scenario: Exploring career interests through accessible career education
    Given Jordan might want to explore other career options
    And career exploration supports life planning
    When Jordan uses career exploration resources
    Then the personal_agent shows career options with pictures and simple descriptions
    And Jordan can learn about different jobs through videos and stories
    And Jordan can explore interests without pressure to commit
    And the educational_elohim provides information about training pathways
    And Jordan's career dreams are taken seriously, not dismissed
    And Jordan experiences hope and possibility through education

  Scenario: Learning safety skills for community independence
    Given Jordan wants to navigate community more independently
    And safety education supports risk-taking and growth
    When Jordan takes community safety education
    Then the training covers real-world scenarios (crossing streets, stranger danger)
    And instruction uses visual supports and repeated practice
    And Jordan can demonstrate understanding in accessible ways
    And safety skills increase Jordan's independent community access
    And education balances safety with dignity and autonomy
    And Jordan's capability for safe independence grows through learning

  Scenario: Participating in peer-led educational workshops
    Given IDD community members teach each other valuable skills
    And peer education is powerful and relatable
    When Jordan attends a peer-led workshop on public transportation
    Then the peer educator teaches from lived experience
    And instruction is naturally accessible (IDD peer teaching IDD peer)
    And Jordan learns strategies that actually work in practice
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for participating in peer learning community
    And the peer educator accumulates tokens for teaching contribution
    And Jordan experiences IDD community as source of knowledge and support

  Scenario: Continuing education about rights and entitlements
    Given Jordan has rights as a person with disabilities
    And knowing rights supports self-advocacy
    When Jordan participates in rights education
    Then Jordan learns about ADA, employment rights, housing rights
    And information is provided in highly accessible format
    And Jordan understands what protections they have
    And Jordan can advocate for their rights when violations occur
    And rights education empowers Jordan's full citizenship
    And Jordan experiences being a person with protected rights and dignity

  Scenario: Learning relationship and sexuality education with dignity
    Given Jordan is an adult with the same needs and desires as any adult
    And comprehensive sexuality education is a right
    When Jordan participates in relationships and sexuality education
    Then instruction is accessible, honest, and dignity-preserving
    And topics include healthy relationships, consent, and body autonomy
    And Jordan's questions are answered respectfully
    And Jordan learns to navigate relationships safely and joyfully
    And Jordan's adult sexuality is honored, not ignored or shamed
    And education supports Jordan's full adult human experience
